Metadata.Title: Toxicology Man : Mendoza
Metadata.Description: Good day agent,if you have done your work agent, you should have 3 ICA lethal vials you will need to bring them, in the villa you will find more, In addition you will have to collect every emetic item on Mendoza and convert them to lethal in the vineyard shed.Good luck agent, I shall leave you to prepare...Original Contract Created by CybraxCyber.Recreated Cross Platform using HCCE by Mando.
